page.title: 08YOUTH CLUB.
page.content: At Eastfield School,Stone Lane, Lightcliffe there is a kind of community centre called The Jubilee Centre.It opens during the day for adults to meet and chat.Sometimes teenagers who have just left school go there.In the evenings the Youth Club meetings are held.There are different sections for Juniors and Seniors.Many games and activities are available such as table-tennis,snooker,and darts. There is a dance floor and a Disco for playing music. A small cafe opens to sell food and soft drinks. The secondary school uses the building at lunchtimes for pupils in the 4th and 5th year's.They go along for lunchtime recreation.Teenagers like to go to the Youth Club at night as it provides them with a place to meet their friends and it keeps them out of trouble.
